MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH1 & EH3 postcode area of Edinburgh, affecting properties in Broughton Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11.36am. Our engineers have arrived on site at Broughton Street substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2.45pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.24pm on the 29th of December 2020
